name: Together (itch) (exptr)
description:
A submission for the Brackeys 2022.2 Game Jam under the theme "You're NOT alone".

The game is a 2D (Pixel art) platformer that relies on collaboration of multiple characters to beat the levels.

Some of the features:

  • Moving platforms (also some that fall)
  • Traps (timed and triggered ones)
  • Enemies
  • Checkpoints, and life points.
  • Portals
  • six playable levels with new features and abilities each.

You need a keyboard to play the game; Arrows are you use to move left and right, Space is used to Jump and double jump. E switches between players, R restarts the level, Enter to skip any messages, and Esc exists to Menu and quits the game.

Most artwork used coming from Pixel Adventure 1 & 2 and Treasure Hunters. Game music is credited to Tim Beek.

I tried my best to make sure the existing levels are playable without any issues or lags, please feel free to drop a comment down below if something is broken.

P.S. I also included a Windows build of the game in case you want to try it out locally.

Hope you enjoy it ;)

                                                                           -exptr
